${ModID}:CollectingSpree.NAME: Груда хлама
DESCRIPTIONS: You come across what appears to be a large pile of junk, but upon further inspection, you see lots of ~useful~ ~cards~ littered around the refuse. NL It seems so ~tempting~ to pick some of them up. There's so many that you're not sure you'll ~know~ ~when~ ~to~ ~stop!~
You resist the urge, and take your leave.
You search and search, but it seems there is nothing left to take.
